item.title: Quick Start Guide to Neural Networks in R with Keras and Tensorflow
item.description: Quick Start Guide to Neural Networks in R with Keras and Tensorflow I’ve been working with neural networks lately and have struggled to find any quick start resources for getting up and running in R. To help others in a similar situation, I’m providing this quick start guide. It’s designed to help you get your first model up and going, enabling you to iterate quickly with your own data.
